Name: Claus Adventure
About the game: Young Klaus embarks on a journey, being inexperienced and weakened from the summer chaos, he tries to find his strength and agility that will allow him to reach the end of his journey and return to his world as a strong and experienced Klaus. Claus Adventure is a platformer with elements of metroidvania, where the player, in order to pass some levels, needs to look for the appropriate skills and return to familiar levels. Features of the game: - Visual style - Elements of Metroidvania - Complexity
